title: Mid... I don't get it.
body:
I feel like mid consists of several types of people.

1. cancer champion mains
2. KDAoholics
3. AD assassins who think they are a boss.

I know there are a few good souls out there who genuinely care about dragon, roaming top/bot to assist, and turrets/nexus killing... but for the life of me... all I see are jerk mid mains who just roam the map looking for easy melts. I don't care if you are 27/14, because the rest of us aren't that well off and their team is stronger because of the stupid amount of gold you fed them, and no, we won't group so you can try to get a penta on katarina because the enemy team is more fed and we need to take dragon and push down a few towers. try not to feed more.
